item.description:
The movie tickets are available now. I strongly advise those who wish to see the show to get them in advance. The show time is at 7PM. Lets meet at the escalators at 6:30 PM. For those of you new to the group, we meet at the lobby level, in front of the escalators next to the front entrance. I wear a little badge to help those who don't know me already to find me.

We usually grab something to eat/drink after the show. We often go to a nearby brewery after the show, but I am open to other ideas. Anyone know a good chinese restaurant that is not too far a walk from the theater?

The next movie in the crazy Pirates of the Caribbean releases this weekend. Call me crazy, but I loved the first two and wouldn't dream of missing the third.

I hope some of you enjoy these films as well.

If you would like some more details on the film, check out:

http://www.darkhorizo...

I will update with film times when they become available.

I did check on line and tickets are not yet available for this show. Buying ahead will probably be wise and I will keep my eye out for when they do become available.
item.name: Pirates of the Caribbean
